# LLMs.txt - AI Knowledge Base for Pantip Clone

## Site Information
Site Name: Pantip Clone
Description: Thai discussion forum platform for sharing knowledge, opinions, and conversations
URL: https://pantip.com
Language: Thai (th-TH) and English
Type: Discussion Forum / Community Platform

## Technical Stack
- Framework: Next.js 15.1.7
- Language: TypeScript
- UI: React 19.0.0 with Tailwind CSS
- State Management: Mock data system (previously Apollo Client/GraphQL)
- Authentication: Removed (previously NextAuth with Google OAuth)
- SEO: next-seo library with comprehensive optimization

## Key Features
- Forum topics with categories and tags
- Comment system with voting
- Search functionality with Pantip API integration
- Category grid with authentic Thai forum categories
- User-friendly Thai interface
- Mobile-responsive design

## API Endpoints
- `/api/search` - Search integration with Pantip service
- `/api/sitemap.xml` - Dynamic XML sitemap generation
- `/api/hello` - Basic API endpoint

## Pages Structure
- `/` - Homepage with latest topics and category grid
- `/search` - Search functionality with query parameters
- `/topic/[id]` - Individual topic pages with comments
- `/tag/[tagname]` - Tag-specific topic listings
- `/tags` - All tags overview
- `/forum/new_topic` - Topic creation page
